channel.title: Talk Back on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Talk Back on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: I Hate My AI Friend
item.description: The chatbot-enabled Friend necklace eavesdrops on your life and provides a running commentary that’s snarky and unhelpful. Worse, it can also make the people around you uneasy.
